name: These Night's at Fredbears
description:
Welcome to These Night's at Fredbear's (TNAF)

Description

------------------

It's 1983 and you are a 22 year old man who is looking for some money. You find a job at "Fredbear's Family Diner." It pays well: $25.76 a week.

Conditions

--------------------

!This game is in Version 1.1! There might be some bugs like: Camera buttons being over the 6 am screen or Gamer Over screen. Animatronics, time, power, stars, Custom Night, saving and loading are all now working!

Credits

---------------------

!This game is in early development! 

This game was designed by Me.

Inspired by @FNAF_BONNIE6

The original creator of FNAF: Scott Cawthon

The TNAF might get mixed up with TNAR.

Animatronic AI, power, time, stars, and Custom Night all were coded by DK-Tutorial/DKUniverse's tutorials (Below).
